title: Benefits to Living Things from Stratospheric Ozone

content.question: The stratospheric ozone layer benefits life on Earth by

choices.label: absorbing 99% of incoming <math alttext="U V B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="U V C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> radiation
contributing to the formation of ground-level ozone
holding large amounts of stratospheric moisture
binding to chlorofluorocarbons (<math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) and breaking down the pollutants

content.answer: absorbing 99% of incoming <math alttext="U V B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="U V C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> radiation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
